item.title: Cloudy future for bourbon has Jim Beam closing Kentucky distillery for a year
item.description: Jim Beam is pausing production at a Kentucky distillery for at least a year starting in 2026

item.title: China to impose up to 42.7% provisional tariffs on EU dairy products
item.description: China has announced provisional tariffs of up to 42.7% on dairy products imported from the European Union

item.title: World shares are mixed and Japan's yen slips after AI stocks push higher on Wall Street
item.description: Shares have opened lower in Europe after gains in Asia that tracked a Wall Street rally led by AI-related stocks

item.title: WSJ's parent firm on trial in Hong Kong, accused of dismissing reporter over union role
item.description: A former Hong Kong reporter at the Wall Street Journal has begun testifying against the newspaper which she alleges terminated her due to her union ac...

item.title: India and New Zealand finalize a free trade agreement, eyeing growth as global uncertainties persist
item.description: India and New Zealand say they have reached a free trade deal to deepen economic ties amid global trade uncertainties
